post.body: You get the musicians... I get the writers. lol
dude, irritable bowels are fascinating. Just ask MY family.
sooooo tired, so probably not. Great offer though - I'll keep it in mind. ;)
smooooooch.
... and now I want a Big Mac.
baaaaahahahaha sex machine.
has got to stop dating famous people. Too much emotional stress.
is actually hungover. Whoops.
often wishes she were an emotionless robot...
has a fucking amazing Christmas haul. Dolce & Gabbana... droooool.
needs a foot massage. Holiday retail is hell.
is deliriously happy.
is about to go to a dive bar to drink beer. Win.
is freezing and sick of the fucking rain.
needs to shake this disease before Friday, dammit.
is still sick but might stay up and watch Zombie Strippers.
is staying home from work this evening to catch up on rest.
is one exhausted and happy MUCC fan.
is having a birthday dinner tonight in Hollywood. 8pm!
is headed to the Viper Room... despite being too exhausted to walk straight.
